subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dominik Hasek led his hometown club, HC Eaton Pardubice, to the Czech league title. Pardubice beat HC Vitkovice Steel, 3-2, in overtime in Ostrava to sweep the finals by 4-0.
snippet: Dominik Hasek led his hometown club, HC Eaton Pardubice, to the Czech league title. Pardubice beat HC Vitkovice Steel, 3-2, in overtime in Ostrava to sweep the finals by 4-0.
